channel.title: Torva,Pernix,Virtus Problem
channel.description: I have a problem with those items in the subject the problem is when you put them on it goes in the weapon slot and it gives no bonuses. How would i fix this?

item.title: Torva,Pernix,Virtus Problem
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

u also can give in itemdef.java or itemdef2.java just the ID of a other armour set that u dont use in the server, like bronze

give torva plate the ID of bronze pl8, and then it will be at right spot ;p

Read full topic

item.title: Torva,Pernix,Virtus Problem
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

Equipment.dat using the .dat editor, then edit the stats in item.cfg.

Read full topic

item.title: Torva,Pernix,Virtus Problem
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

[quote=“Aesyr, post:8, topic:394451”]Bunch of spamming noobs. If you’re going to reply, this is the fucking help section. Help, ask for help, or get the fuck out.

Go look for an item that equips to the slot you wish to place the items in, and then when you find one, place your item ID in the array.

If you couldn’t follow that (I’m bad at explaining in sentences) this should be fine:

  1. Go to itemHandler.java or whatever it’s in
  2. Hit (Ctrl - F) and search for the ID of another item that goes into the same slot as you desire
  3. Place your item ID in with the rest, make sure to put it after a comma, and also put a comma after it.

– It should be self-explanatory, if you want to take the easy way, which array goes to which slot. Most sources have them labeled as “platebody” or “legs” or something like that. You shouldn’t have much of a hard time. Just search your source for the ID to a non-special item that does not equip to the weapon slot.

I.E. For the Torva platebody, you should search the ID of maybe, bronze platebody, for Virtus skirt, bronze platelegs, and so on.[/quote]
Ok i found what you were talking about in my itemassistant.java and i put it in there with the others and it didnt work its still going in the weapon slot.

Read full topic

Go look for an item that equips to the slot you wish to place the items in, and then when you find one, place your item ID in the array.

If you couldn’t follow that (I’m bad at explaining in sentences) this should be fine:

  1. Go to itemHandler.java or whatever it’s in
  2. Hit (Ctrl - F) and search for the ID of another item that goes into the same slot as you desire
  3. Place your item ID in with the rest, make sure to put it after a comma, and also put a comma after it.

– It should be self-explanatory, if you want to take the easy way, which array goes to which slot. Most sources have them labeled as “platebody” or “legs” or something like that. You shouldn’t have much of a hard time. Just search your source for the ID to a non-special item that does not equip to the weapon slot.

I.E. For the Torva platebody, you should search the ID of maybe, bronze platebody, for Virtus skirt, bronze platelegs, and so on.[/quote]

item.title: Torva,Pernix,Virtus Problem
item.dc:creator: @Aesyr Aesyr
item.description:
@Aesyr wrote:

Bunch of spamming noobs. If you’re going to reply, this is the fucking help section. Help, ask for help, or get the fuck out.

Go look for an item that equips to the slot you wish to place the items in, and then when you find one, place your item ID in the array.

If you couldn’t follow that (I’m bad at explaining in sentences) this should be fine:

  1. Go to itemHandler.java or whatever it’s in
  2. Hit (Ctrl - F) and search for the ID of another item that goes into the same slot as you desire
  3. Place your item ID in with the rest, make sure to put it after a comma, and also put a comma after it.

– It should be self-explanatory, if you want to take the easy way, which array goes to which slot. Most sources have them labeled as “platebody” or “legs” or something like that. You shouldn’t have much of a hard time. Just search your source for the ID to a non-special item that does not equip to the weapon slot.

I.E. For the Torva platebody, you should search the ID of maybe, bronze platebody, for Virtus skirt, bronze platelegs, and so on.

Read full topic
